Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-48957 affecting package libarchive for versions less than 3.7.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-48957 affecting package libarchive for versions less than 3.7.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
